description: Former Vice President Pence said there is an “ethical cloud" hanging over the Biden family and President Biden’s administration, while telling Fox News Digital he would support an impeachment inquiry led by House Republicans.

title: DeSantis calls out 'weak-kneed Republicans' afraid to offend, as some Democrats panic over migrant crisis
description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis said too many Republicans are afraid certain electorates will turn against them so they recoil from actively opposing liberal migrant policies.

title: California becomes first US state to recognize 'Transgender History Month'
description: California became the first U.S. state to recognize August as 'Transgender History Month' after the state assembly approved a Democrat-led measure Wednesday.

title: Surfside condo collapse investigators reveal pool deck construction 'deviated from design requirements'
description: Federal investigators from the National Institute of Standards and Technology say the design of the pool deck at a collapsed condo building in Florida “deviated" from requirements.

title: Marlins ball boy commits foul play in fair territory during game
description: A Miami Marlins ball boy suffered a faux pas during the team's game against the Los Angeles Dodgers on Thursday night, as he threw a playable ball into the stands.

title: Migrants take over Chicago airport, Trump might hint at VP choice at rally and more top headlines
description: Migrants take over Chicago airport, Trump might hint at VP choice at rally and more top headlines

title: Murdaugh court clerk Becky Hill spotted for first time since twist in murder saga: video
description: South Carolina court clerk Becky Hill was photographed for the first time Thursday since Alex Murdaugh's lawyers accused her of tampering with jurors in a motion for a new trial.

title: North Carolina's Mack Brown unleashes on NCAA after Tez Walker ruled ineligible for the season
description: North Carolina coach Mack Brown criticized the NCAA for its handling of Devontez Walker's eligibility. The university stated multiple reasons why Walker should be allowed to play.

title: Kari Lake rips NFL over Black national anthem being played before Chiefs-Lions game
description: Kari Lake took issue with the NFL allowing the Black national anthem to played before the opening game between the Kansas City Chiefs and Detroit Lions.

title: Beer industry expert: Bud Light's decline looks ‘quasi-permanent,’ ‘those consumers are just lost forever’
description: Damage to Bud Light appears “quasi permanent" after the brand failed to rebound from ongoing backlash as initially expected, according to the publisher of Beer Business Daily.

title: Shooting at Lil Baby concert inside Memphis' FedExForum arena leaves 1 injured: police
description: One person was critically wounded in a shooting at Lil Baby's concert inside the FedExForum arena in Memphis, Tennessee. Police have not yet identified a suspect.

title: Biden's not too old. He's too Joe Biden (incompetent for decades)
description: Plenty of political observers are concerned about President Joe Biden's age and his plan to run for reelection. But they really should take a closer look at the man and his abilities.

title: 'Tell Chuck Schumer': Ted Cruz riffs on NYC mayor's 'hypocrisy' after calling Abbott an immigration 'madman'
description: Senate Majority Leader Charles Schumer, D-N.Y., should be the real recipient of New York Mayor Eric Adams' ire over the migrant crisis in town, Ted Cruz said.

title: Burnt out and getting out: American hospitals struggle with increasing shortage of nurses
description: Registered nurses in America are at their tipping point as many are choosing to hang up their scrubs because of stress and burnout. Studies show about a fifth of RNs will quit by 2027.

title: Dem Party chairwoman who once called to defund the police carjacked and assaulted in Minneapolis
description: Minnesota DFL 2nd Vice Chairwoman Shivanthi Sathanandan wrote a Facebook post that claimed she was violently carjacked in front of her children outside her home.

title: Hunter's possible gun charge could get 'pretty wacky, pretty fast' for Joe Biden: Turley
description: FOX News contributor Jonathan Turley says Hunter Biden's problem is that his plea deal "fell apart," so his team must argue against a possible gun charge.

title: Two Republicans want to force Biden admin to release all the records on COVID-19's origin
description: Two Republican lawmakers are introducing a bill to require the HHS secretary to publicly release all documents related to the origins of COVID-19.

title: Tuberville’s actions are horribly dangerous to our military and hurt American families
description: Tuberville’s actions halting promotions are horribly dangerous to our military. The hold also hurts many military families and leaves them stuck between assignments.

title: NFL legend Jerry Rice predicts 'exceptional' season for 49ers, believes emergency QB rule will help team
description: NFL legend Jerry Rice spoke to Fox News Digital recently about the San Francisco 49ers' upcoming season and why he believes the team is ripe for a terrific year.

title: Speaker McCarthy, you have no excuse: You must lead fight to crush Dem agenda and save America
description: Speaker McCarthy earned his spot after 15 ballots. Now he has no excuse. He must lead the fight to stop the Democrats and end weaponized justice against political opponents.

title: Jimmy Fallon apologizes to 'Tonight Show' staff following report on 'erratic behavior,' 'toxic workplace'
description: NBC star Jimmy Fallon reportedly apologized to staffers Thursday evening following a bombshell report alleging his "erratic behavior" created a "toxic workplace."

title: 'Dukes of Hazzard' star John Schneider's faith saved him after wife's death: 'Would have jumped off a bridge'
description: "The Dukes of Hazzard" star John Schneider credits his faith for saving his life after losing his wife, Alicia Allain, to cancer in February.

title: These 10 nutrition mistakes could be taking years off your life: Here's what to do instead
description: Dr. Brett Osborn, a Florida neurologist and founder of the anti-aging facility Senolytix, shared with Fox News Digital the top 10 nutrition mistakes people are making — and what to do instead.

title: California bill decriminalizing personal use of psychedelics, magic mushrooms heads to Newsom's desk
description: A bill decriminalizing the possession and personal use of psychedelics now heads to Gov. Gavin Newsom's desk after both houses in the California legislature approved it.

title: Harvard professor says military members keep service quiet to avoid backlash from classmates
description: Harvard professor Kit Parker touted the importance of academic freedom while weighing in on a nonprofit organization's report ranking the college the lowest for free speech.

title: Three top takeaways from the Senate Energy committee hearing on DOE and AI
description: Lawmakers within the Senate Energy Committee heard from experts and officials about the DOE's work with AI and where the technology penetrates other facets of everyday life.

title: 'AGT' judge Simon Cowell reveals he is ‘not a fan’ of AI
description: Simon Cowell spoke with Fox News Digital about his thoughts on artificial intelligence as he works on new music publishing.

title: Newspaper blocks ChatGPT from content amid growing backlash against new tech
description: The United Kingdom-based The Guardian newspaper announced on its website last week that the company had blocked OpenAI, owner of ChatGPT, from accessing its online content.

title: Queen Elizabeth's royal family:  King Charles, Camilla carry monarchy amid drama one year after her death
description: King Charles III and his wife Camilla were crowned in May at Westminster Abbey. True Royalty TV's Nick Bullen shared how the royal couple is following the late queen's mantra.

title: AI-powered technology to offer interactive live shopping for fans during NFL games
description: Many NFL fans have or plan to purchase merchandise to represent their favorite team. Artificial intelligence is introducing a game-changing way for fans to engage in live shopping.

title: AI belongs in schools. Here's how I plan to use it to help, not hurt my students
description: When it comes to education and other fields, I am convinced that AI will add to the rich tapestry of human knowledge not replace it

title: Longwood Gardens closes as search for convicted killer who escaped from Pennsylvania prison intensifies
description: Longwood Gardens, a botanical garden in Chester County, Pennsylvania, has temporarily closed after escaped inmate and convicted killer Danelo Cavalcante was possibly seen in the area.

title: On this day in history, September 8, 1966, iconic TV series 'Star Trek' premieres
description: Live long and prosper! The television series "Star Trek" debuted on this day in history, Sept. 8, 1966, introducing the world to Captain Kirk and Mr. Spock.
